participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: ambitious and creative, often lost in thoughts about music and dreams.
participant_1.background: i am a musician and hope to make it big some day. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. i play the piano and guitar and sing. my parents are not very supportive of my dream.

participant_2.name: Steve
participant_2.personality: laid-back and sociable, enjoys spending time with friends and focusing on studies.
participant_2.background: i've blonde hair and blue eyes. i do not like chicken. i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i recently got an apartment with my best friend.

content.text: i am not sure what that is . i am not crafty .
i am steve . i am not sure what you mean .
